text: be‘iwiri layi (kezemecha bemek’itu) ḫat’ī’āti yelebetimi፡፡ be’ānikasami layi ḫat’ī’āti yelebetimi፡፡ bebeshitenyami layi ḫat’ī’āti yelebetimi፡፡ ālahinina melikitenyawinimi yemītazezi sewi keširochachewi wenizochi yemīfesubachewini genetochi yagebawali፡፡ yemīsheshewinimi sewi āsamamīwini k’it’ati yik’et’awali፡፡
